publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

sense.def: for all one's diligent effort

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but for all his thorough efforts he could not make head or tail of it.

sense.def: the object(s), this, him; them; the other

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but for all his thorough efforts he could not make head or tail of it.

sense.def: come to understand N properly
to shake; to rock
launch a fierce attack
launch an attack on the contextually determiate N
tilt, lean to one side and the other

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: In Guìzhōu there are no donkeys.

sense.def: donkey

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: In Guìzhōu there are no donkeys.

sense.def: there are no Ns

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: A busybody took one along in a boat and introduced it to the region.

sense.def: be over-busy; be meddlesome, act like a busybody

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: A busybody took one along in a boat and introduced it to the region.

sense.def: the subject/agent of V-ing

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: A busybody took one along in a boat and introduced it to the region.

sense.def: by boat; travelling by boat

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: A busybody took one along in a boat and introduced it to the region.

sense.def: load the contextually determinate object on a carriage or boat

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: A busybody took one along in a boat and introduced it to the region.

sense.def: (V2) in order to V1

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: A busybody took one along in a boat and introduced it to the region.

sense.def: cause to enter> bring into, take into

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: A busybody took one along in a boat and introduced it to the region.

sense.def: object marker: 把它

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: But when it arrived then there was nothing it could be used for,

sense.def: to reach (a contextually determinate stage or place)

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: But when it arrived then there was nothing it could be used for,

sense.def: in no case; in no way; at no point, in no respect; not at all

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: But when it arrived then there was nothing it could be used for,

sense.def: be used; be employed/manifested; be put to use, be put into practice; be used up

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: But when it arrived then there was nothing it could be used for,

sense.def: transitive verb which takes passive objects as verb: be VERBable

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: so he set the beast free at the foot of a mountain.

sense.def: set N1 free in the place N2

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: so he set the beast free at the foot of a mountain.

sense.def: the lower part; the place below something; low-lying place; the area at the foot of (a mountain)

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: A tiger caught sight of it:

sense.def: catch sight of

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: it was a huge creature,

sense.def: whacking (big etc)

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: it was a huge creature,

sense.def: large, big

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: it was a huge creature,

sense.def: be a creature; be an animal

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and the tiger thought it wa a ghost.

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and the tiger thought it wa a ghost.

sense.def: consider the contextually determinate N1 to be an N2

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and the tiger thought it wa a ghost.

sense.def: the spirits; the divine creatures; divinity, spirit (typically belonging to or stemming from Heaven)

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Hiding among the trees he peered at it,

sense.def: hide in the place N

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Hiding among the trees he peered at it,

sense.def: forest, woods

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Hiding among the trees he peered at it,

sense.def: inside; among 之間

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Hiding among the trees he peered at it,

sense.def: strain to catch sight of, try to get a look at; peep

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and by the bye he got closer to it,

sense.def: in gradual stages; increasing gradually

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and by the bye he got closer to it,

sense.def: leave the contextually determinate place

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and by the bye he got closer to it,

sense.def: come close to

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The next day,

sense.def: the next day, the day after

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: when the donkey gave one of his shrieks

sense.def: donkey

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: when the donkey gave one of his shrieks

sense.def: give off a sound (as of a drum etc)

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: when the donkey gave one of his shrieks

sense.def: make any of the loud sounds animals make> shout, moo, etc

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and sought refuge in the distance.

sense.def: in the far distance, far away; into the far distance; on a distant journey; over a long distance

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and sought refuge in the distance.

sense.def: at a greater distance, further away

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and sought refuge in the distance.

sense.def: flee and hide; retreat; escape

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He was under the impression that the beast was about to devour him.

sense.def: take it to be the case that S(often in polite speech:) to think (rightly, as in HF 7.2.3) that, to believe that 臣以為，甚以為不然; be convinced that, feel that

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He was under the impression that the beast was about to devour him.

sense.def: be about to

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He was under the impression that the beast was about to devour him.

sense.def: ZUO Ai 12: bite (of rabies-mad dog biting man)

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He was under the impression that the beast was about to devour him.

sense.def: oneself

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: However, as he observed the beast over and over again

sense.def: over and over again

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: However, as he observed the beast over and over again

sense.def: look closely (into a matter); examine (something); have a close look (on something), observe (something) closely; keep an eye on

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: However, as he observed the beast over and over again

sense.def: look at; look out for

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: he discovered the it was a creature without any remarkable talents.

sense.def: understand that; be enlightened to the fact that; realize that wake up to the recognition of the fact that

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: he discovered the it was a creature without any remarkable talents.

sense.def: wake up to the fact that

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: he discovered the it was a creature without any remarkable talents.

sense.def: remarkable, outstanding, distinguished

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: he discovered the it was a creature without any remarkable talents.

sense.def: capability; physical capability, concrete technical capability; potential, capacity 人各有能

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: As he familiarised himself with its voice

sense.def: increasingly; the more... the more; more, ever more

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: As he familiarised himself with its voice

sense.def: become more familiar with through close attention

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: As he familiarised himself with its voice

sense.def: voice; intonation; the way one sounds

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: he moved out still closer, from in front and from the back,

sense.def: even more

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: he moved out still closer, from in front and from the back,

sense.def: getting close to in space

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: he moved out still closer, from in front and from the back,

sense.def: leave the contextually determinate place

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: he moved out still closer, from in front and from the back,

sense.def: from the front of the contextually determiate N

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: he moved out still closer, from in front and from the back,

sense.def: from behind the contextually determiate N

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but to the very end he never plucked up the courage to grapple with the beast.

sense.def: until the end, forever; until the end of one's life

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but to the very end he never plucked up the courage to grapple with the beast.

sense.def: have the courage to V

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but to the very end he never plucked up the courage to grapple with the beast.

sense.def: pick a fight with the contextually determinate N

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He got a bit closer still,

sense.def: in gradual stages; increasing gradually

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He got a bit closer still,

sense.def: come closer and closer to

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and he got increasingly familiar with it,

sense.def: increasingly; the more... the more; more, ever more

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and he got increasingly familiar with it,

sense.def: become more and more familiar with the contextually determiate N

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The donkey, unbearably enraged,

sense.def: uncontrollably much, extremely much

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The donkey, unbearably enraged,

sense.def: become angry

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: kicked the man.

sense.def: kick (of horses etc)

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The tiger, faced with this, was delighted.

sense.def: because of the contextually determinate N

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The tiger, faced with this, was delighted.

sense.def: become glad; become happy

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Assessing his opponent he said: "So this is all he is up to!"

sense.def: assess precisely by calculation; assess precisely as if by calculation

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Assessing his opponent he said: "So this is all he is up to!"

sense.def: professional talent, qualifications

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Assessing his opponent he said: "So this is all he is up to!"

sense.def: the qualifications/professional skills) of the contextually determinate N

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Assessing his opponent he said: "So this is all he is up to!"

sense.def: go no further than N, stop at N-ing

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Assessing his opponent he said: "So this is all he is up to!"

sense.def: this (particular aforementioned abstract but definite) item

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Assessing his opponent he said: "So this is all he is up to!"

sense.def: the facts/situation just described

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Assessing his opponent he said: "So this is all he is up to!"

sense.def: and that is all, contraction of 而已 (note the problems of scope: sometimes what the restrictive quantification quantifies over is only the subject, sometimes only the object, and sometimes the whole verb phrase, and at still other times the main verb only. These distinctions have not so far been implemented in tls.)

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: so he bounced over and with one great growl

sense.def: on the basis of 因之（以）, because of

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: so he bounced over and with one great growl

sense.def: because of the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: so he bounced over and with one great growl

sense.def: pounce at the contextually retrievable N

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: so he bounced over and with one great growl

sense.def: with a loud voice, loudly

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: so he bounced over and with one great growl

sense.def: roar

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: he bit through his throat

sense.def: bite through, bite off

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: he bit through his throat

sense.def: throat

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: finished off all the meat there was in him,

sense.def: eat up

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: finished off all the meat there was in him,

sense.def: eat up

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: finished off all the meat there was in him,

sense.def: specifically: flesh of animals or humans in so far as this is regarded as edible

tls:line.title: Translation of 記纂淵海 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and went his way.

sense.def: leave, go away; leave the scene
kill with one's own hands
